resource.string: This bot is designed to facilitate connection between you and the Student Union (SU). This bot can help you to send various requests to the Student Union. It may be a new project, question, complaint â€” or anything else you want to tell SU about.\n\nPlease use the buttons below for navigation.
Alright, now write your request, providing all the information that you consider to be useful here.
Are you sure you want to send request?
Are you sure you want to cancel creating of request?
You have canceled the request creation.
Your request was successfully sent. Soon you will receive the response from SU.
Unfortunately, there was a problem saving your request.
Invalid value of property. Try writing another value.
Should we send a message when the request status is changed?
See requests from a specific user
